title: ParPrac
text:
Question 1

library(parallel)
library(foreach)
library(doParallel)

Loading required package: iterators


Warning: package 'iterators' was built under R version 4.4.3

library(knitr)
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1)  
registerDoParallel(cl)


results <- foreach(i = 1:100, .combine = rbind) %dopar% {
    x = rexp(100,rate=1)
    c(mean=mean(x),var=var(x))
}
stopCluster(cl)
head(results)

              mean       var
result.1 1.0940733 0.6790482
result.2 0.8789881 0.5957701
result.3 1.0139736 0.9251256
result.4 1.0026553 0.9116460
result.5 0.9826080 1.0948201
result.6 0.9529760 0.7864051


Question2

library(MASS)
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1)  
registerDoParallel(cl)
df = galaxies
start_parallel <- Sys.time()
B_med <- foreach(i=1:1000, .combine = rbind) %dopar% {
  x = sample(df,50,replace=T)
  c(median=median(x))
}
end_parallel <- Sys.time()
stopCluster(cl)


start_seq <- Sys.time()
B_med <- foreach(i=1:1000, .combine = rbind) %do% {
  x = sample(df,50,replace=T)
  c(median=median(x))
}
end_seq <- Sys.time()

parallel_time <- end_parallel - start_parallel
serial_time <- end_seq - start_seq
parallel_time

Time difference of 0.288244 secs

serial_time

Time difference of 0.178303 secs


Question 3

true_mean <-  1
  
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1) 
registerDoParallel(cl)
results <- foreach(i = 1:1000, .combine = c) %dopar% {
  #Generate sample data
  sample_data <- rexp(50,1)
    
  # Bootstrap resampling
  boot_means <- replicate(1000, mean(sample(sample_data, 50, replace = TRUE)))
    
  # Compute Percentile Bootstrap CI
  ci_lower <- quantile(boot_means, 0.05 / 2)
  ci_upper <- quantile(boot_means, 1 - 0.05 / 2)
    
  # Check if the true mean falls within the CI
  (true_mean >= ci_lower) & (true_mean <= ci_upper)
}
stopCluster(cl)
coverage_prob <- mean(results)
coverage_prob

[1] 0.935


Question 4

library(iterators)
set.seed(1234)
result <-  irnorm(n=5, mean = 0, sd = 1)
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1) 
registerDoParallel(cl)
q4 <- foreach(i=1:3,.combine=rbind) %do%{
  x=max(nextElem(result))
  c(x)
}
stopCluster(cl)
print(q4)

              [,1]
result.1 1.0844412
result.2 0.5060559
result.3 0.9594941


Question 5

set.seed(1234)
result <-  irnorm(n=5, mean = 0, sd = 1)
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1) 
registerDoParallel(cl)
startFE <- Sys.time()
q5a <- foreach(i=1:3,.combine=rbind) %do%{
  x=max(nextElem(result))
  c(x)
}
stopCluster(cl)
endFE <- Sys.time()
ForEachTime = startFE-endFE


set.seed(1234)
result <-  irnorm(n=5, mean = 0, sd = 1)
startB <- Sys.time()
q5b <- replicate(3,{
  x=max(nextElem(result))
})
endB <- Sys.time()

ReplicateTime = startB-endB


set.seed(1234)
result <-  irnorm(n=5, mean = 0, sd = 1)
a1=nextElem(result)
a2=nextElem(result)
a3=nextElem(result)
L=list(a1,a2,a3)
find_max <- function(x) {
  return(max(x))
}
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1) 
clusterExport(cl, "find_max")
startC <- Sys.time()
max_values <- parLapply(cl, L, find_max)
endC <- Sys.time()
stopCluster(cl)
ParLApplyTime = startC-endC


ForEachTime

Time difference of -0.007094145 secs

ReplicateTime

Time difference of -0.002369881 secs

ParLApplyTime

Time difference of -0.004482031 secs
